outputs.output_descr:
1.	Strengthen the Lao Bar Association in order to enable it to function eventually as a professional, independent institution, able to provide a range of legal services, including, in the future, legal aid.
2.	Review traditional systems of Justice and linkages with the formal system, through a study of the village mediation units.

project_descr: Enhancing Access to Justice through the Lao Bar Association
project_title: Enhancing Access to Justice through the Lao Bar Associat
